com.javaweb

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.javaweb.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller.java

    It is class for engine of the game. Here we take view methods to show information about game, menu, etc. Also we take model methods to use business logic of this game. Here are some input verifications

    Version:
    1.0 29 Oct 2016
    Author:
    Andrii Chernysh {itcherry97@gmail.com}

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Main function in this class. Main thread call this method from MainMain This method makes menu and input all data from console in correct way. Also it makes and show statistic using data, which we create during playing the game
